scripts.start: dotenvx run --env-file=.env -- echo "Starting server..." && node src/index.js -p ${SERVER_PORT:-3001}
scripts.start:test: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- echo "üîç Environment variables:" && printenv | grep -E 'NODE_ENV|DATABASE_URL' && echo "üîß Setting up test database..." && node scripts/setup-test-db.js && echo "üöÄ Starting server with test configuration..." && NODE_OPTIONS='--no-deprecation --disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning' nodemon src/index.js -p ${SERVER_PORT:-3001}
scripts.debug:env:
echo "Server Before dotenvx:" && printenv | grep -E 'NODE_ENV|DATABASE_URL' && echo "
Server After dotenvx:" && dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- printenv | grep -E 'NODE_ENV|DATABASE_URL' && echo "
Server Node Process:" && dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- node -e "console.log('NODE_ENV=' + process.env.NODE_ENV)" && echo "
Server Nodemon Process:" && dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- nodemon --exitcrash --exec "node -e \"console.log('NODE_ENV=' + process.env.NODE_ENV)\""
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for server'
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: dotenvx run --env-file=.env -- echo "üîç Migrating production database..." && prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.development -- echo "üîç Migrating development database..." && prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:test: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- echo "üîç Migrating test database..." && prisma migrate dev
